Section.Title: Description
Section.Paragraph: The ConvertSampleRate method performs a high quality resampling operation on the supplied raw sample data buffer, from the specified input sample rate to the desired output sample rate.

Section.Title: Usage
Section.Code: static void ConvertSampleRate(const std::vector<short>& sourceData, unsigned int sourceSampleCount, unsigned int achannelCount, std::vector<short>& targetData, unsigned int targetSampleCount);

ArgumentList.ArgumentListEntry: The input sample data to convert
The sample rate of the input sample data
The number of channels in the sample data
The output buffer to receive the converted sample data. If this buffer contains any existing data, it will be erased.
The desired sample rate of the output sample data
